name: WP Admin View
author: Krish Johnson (krishjohnson)

sections.description:
WP Admin View – WordPress plugin provide several options/tools to completely change the entire look of default WordPress admin section. It can be used to offer your customers a complete new & stylish admin dashboard with your brand name.

*** Features

* White Label Branding.
* Unlimited color options + 16 pre-made themes.
* Flat/Default design.
* White Label Emails.
* Upload custom logo for login and dashboard pages.
* Hide, rename and sort admin menu items.
* Hide unwanted widgets from dashboard.
* Privilege Users who can access to all menu items.
* RTL Compatibility.
* Custom Icons for admin menu items: Dashicons and FontAwesome icons
* Custom login Theme.
* Manage and Create custom dashboard widgets.
* Manage Admin Bar elements.
* Ability to add custom links to the admin bar.
* Disable automatic background updates.
* Multi-site Network Support – Global option/Individual blog option.
* Export and Import of settings feature.
* Powerful and simple to use Options panel.
* Add custom css styles for login and admin pages.
* Tested for Compatibility with popular plugins: Contact form 7, Visual Composer, WP Super cache, WP Total cache, woocommerce, etc.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-admin-view directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the ‘WP Admin View’ option in left admin menu to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial version.
  • Developed with deep analysis.
  • New features will be added in new version.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-admin-view directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the ‘WP Admin View’ option in left admin menu to configure the plugin

short_description: WP Admin View plugin provide several options to customize WordPress Admin theme, elements & views.
